sentences.en: Don't be an Irate caller yourself.
sentences.cn: 你自己也不要做发怒的打电话者.

sentences.en: Everybody has to deal with Irate callers.
sentences.cn: 每个人都不得不面对发怒者.

sentences.en: He dragged the irate fellow to the door.
sentences.cn: 他把那个发怒的家伙拖到门口.

sentences.en: He received a flood of letters from irate constituents.
sentences.cn: 他收到愤怒的选区居民洪水般涌来的信件。

sentences.en: I heard an irate voice call out.
sentences.cn: 我听到有人以愤怒的声音喊叫.

sentences.en: Really irate, and you have to try and calm them down.
sentences.cn: 非常让人生气, 但你还要尽力让他平静下来.

sentences.en: Sensing that his life was in jeopardy, the hunter played possum until the irate lion disappeared.
sentences.cn: 当他意识到自己的生命有危险, 这个猎手开始装死,一直到发怒的狮子走远.

sentences.en: She then wrote an extremely irate letter to the New Statesman about me.
sentences.cn: 她接着给《新政治家》杂志写了一封关于我的信，言辞极其激烈。

sentences.en: The irate animal made for us, coming at a full jump.
sentences.cn: 那头发怒的动物以最快的速度向我们冲过来.

sentences.en: The irate quadruped made for our party, coming at a full jump.
sentences.cn: 那头发怒的四足兽以最快的速度向我们冲来.

sentences.en: The now - irate patrolman asked me why I wouldn't delete the picture.
sentences.cn: 那现在 - 发怒的巡视者了我我为什么不划除照片.

sentences.en: The owner was so irate he almost threw me out of the place.
sentences.cn: 店主非常恼火，差点把我从那个地方扔出去。

sentences.en: We have received some irate phone calls from customers.
sentences.cn: 我们接到顾客打来的一些愤怒的电话.

sentences.en: We PULL BACK and see that he is being chased by an irate BRUNETTE ( 20's ).
sentences.cn: 我们把镜头向后拉,看到,怒气冲冲的布鲁涅特 ( 20岁左右 ) 正在他后面追赶着.

trans.tran_en: If someone is irate, they are very angry about something
